item.title: 据 ANP 报道，拉加德称结将成为一名出色的欧洲央行行长
item.description: 荷兰新闻社ANP援引将于周日发布的一集播客节目 "金融领域的学院领袖 "报道称，欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）将是一个合适的继任者。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said Klaas Knot would be a suitable successor, Dutch newswire ANP reported, citing a podcast episode of “College Leaders in Finance,” which will be released on Sunday.】

item.title: 美国关门导致数据延迟，新兴市场暂停喘息
item.description: 新兴市场股市和货币横盘整理，因为美国政府关门导致数据发布延迟，迫使全球投资者暂停投资。【原文：Emerging market stocks and currencies are trading sideways, as the US government shutdown delays data releases and forces global investors to take a pause.】

item.title: 印度数据中心公司两周内申请 5 亿美元 IPO
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Sify Infinit Spaces 有限公司正准备在未来两周内申请首次公开募股，募资额为 5 亿美元，这可能是印度首家在证券交易所上市的数据中心运营商。【原文：Sify Infinit Spaces Ltd. is preparing to file for a $500 million initial public offering in the next two weeks, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could be the first Indian data-center operator to list on bourses.】

item.title: 斯德哥尔摩正成为欧洲最热门的 IPO 市场
item.description: 今年欧洲最受欢迎的公司上市地点是一个不太可能的地方：斯德哥尔摩。【原文：The most popular place for a company to go public in Europe this year is an unlikely one: Stockholm.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数测试历史记录，英镑徘徊在 1.34 美元附近
萨博在防务狂潮中股价大涨后遭分析师回避
item.description: 分析师们认为，与其他欧洲防务公司相比，萨博公司的股票风险更大，因为该公司在过去一年中取得了惊人的收益，没有任何出错的余地。【原文：Analysts are singling out Saab AB’s stock as a riskier bet than other European defense companies after a year of spectacular gains left no room for anything to go wrong.】

item.title: 关键协议达成后，美国寻求使库尔德石油出口长期化
item.description: 伊拉克北部的石油出口在中断两年后恢复，特朗普政府正努力确保石油出口长期保持畅通，以支持该国经济，使美国公司受益，并对抗伊朗在该地区的影响力。【原文：The Trump administration is working to ensure oil exports from northern Iraq, which resumed after a two-year halt, keep flowing in the long term to bolster the nation’s economy, benefit US companies and counter Iran’s influence in the region.】

item.title: 迪拜宾哈蒂公司称正与花旗银行和摩根士丹利商谈 IPO 事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于迪拜的宾哈蒂控股有限公司（Binghatti Holding Ltd. ）正在与银行洽谈，以安排可能的首次公开募股，因为该公司正试图利用迪拜的房地产热潮。【原文：Dubai-based Binghatti Holding Ltd. is in talks with banks to arrange a possible initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, as it seeks to tap into a real estate boom in the emirate.】

item.title: 泰铢为何无视经济引力
item.description: 按照目前的走势，泰铢兑美元汇率有望创下六年来的最大年度涨幅，这让新上任的总理阿努廷-占维拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）政府头疼不已。【原文：On its current trajectory, the Thai baht is expected to record its biggest annual gain in six years against the US dollar, creating a headache for newly appointed Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul’s government.】

item.title: 菲律宾军方领导人称拒绝接受解除马科斯职务的呼吁
item.description: 菲律宾军方首脑表示，他拒绝接受一些退休军官要求武装部队解除小费迪南德-马科斯总统职务的呼吁。【原文：The Philippines’ military chief said he rejected calls by some retired officers for the armed forces to remove President Ferdinand Marcos Jr.】

item.title: 人工智能主导 2025 年风险投资，吸引 1927 亿美元资金
item.description: 据数据提供商PitchBook称，今年到目前为止，风险投资家向人工智能初创企业投入了1927亿美元，创下了新的全球纪录，并使2025年有望成为风险投资资金总额中首次有一半以上投入该行业的年份。【原文：Venture capitalists poured $192.7 billion into AI startups so far this year — setting new global records and putting 2025 on track to be the first year where more than half of total VC dollars went into the industry, according to data provider PitchBook.】

item.title: 维克多-欧尔班统治结束的早期赌注使福林涨势加深
item.description: 匈牙利反对党领袖彼得-马扎尔（Peter Magyar）计划在下届大选后重新调整与投资者和欧盟的关系，并承诺从欧盟获得大量援助，这加速了福林今年的涨势。【原文：Hungarian opposition leader Peter Magyar’s plans to reset relations with investors and the European Union after the next elections are accelerating this year’s rally in the forint, by promising a windfall in aid from the bloc.】

item.title: 投资者热捧坦桑尼亚中央银行发行债券
item.description: 坦桑尼亚资产规模最大的贷款机构 CRDB Bank Plc 在投资者对其超额认购的债券兴趣浓厚之后，正在考虑重返债市。【原文：CRDB Bank Plc, Tanzania’s largest lender by assets, is weighing a return to the debt market after robust investor appetite for its oversubscribed bonds.】

item.title: 民意调查显示瑞士对美国过于友好
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统对瑞士进口商品征收超额关税后，瑞士选民认为他们的政府对美国过于顺从。【原文：Swiss voters reckon their government is being too amenable to the US after President Donald Trump imposed an outsized tariff on their country’s imports.】

item.title: 马来西亚矿业公司称未与中国就稀土项目进行谈判
item.description: 马来西亚主权财富基金（Khazanah Nasional Bhd）首席投资官希沙姆-哈姆丹（Hisham Hamdan）驳斥媒体报道称，该基金并未与中国就在东南亚国家加工稀土的项目进行谈判。【原文：Malaysia’s sovereign wealth fund Khazanah Nasional Bhd said it is not talks with China over a project to process rare earths in the Southeast Asian country, refuting a media report, Chief Investment Officer Hisham Hamdan said.】

item.title: 供应担忧和美元走弱为铜价反弹增添动力
item.description: 由于供应中断、美元走软以及对需求的乐观预期支撑铜价上涨，铜价创下 4 月份以来的最大单周涨幅，比去年创下的纪录低约 5%。【原文：Copper headed for the biggest weekly advance since April — with prices about 5% below the record set last year — as supply disruptions, a weaker US dollar, and optimism about demand supported gains.】

item.title: 台风 "麦德姆 "在袭击菲律宾时加强，正向中国移动
item.description: 台风 "麦德姆 "周五在菲律宾北部登陆时强度加大，预计将在那里降下暴雨。【原文：Typhoon Matmo intensified as it made landfall in northern Philippines on Friday where it’s forecast to dump heavy rain, with the nation still reeling from the impact of two deadly typhoons in the past two weeks.】

item.title: 越南央行誓言推动经济增长，限制信贷风险
item.description: 越南国家银行在河内举行的一次情况通报会上表示，该行计划在控制通胀的同时继续推行刺激经济增长的政策，目的是增加对企业的贷款，同时控制对风险较高行业的信贷。【原文：The State Bank of Vietnam plans to keep pursuing policies to spur growth while containing inflation, aiming to boost lending to businesses even as it controls credit to riskier sectors, according to a central bank briefing in Hanoi.】

item.title: 新加坡政府投资公司（GIC）认为人工智能风险投资存在 "炒作 "泡沫，债券存在抛售风险
item.description: 新加坡政府投资私人有限公司（GIC Pte）的首席投资官警告说，早期人工智能风险投资正在形成 "炒作泡沫"，他也加入了投资者的行列，对该行业的繁荣敲响了警钟。【原文：GIC Pte’s chief investment officer warned of a “hype bubble” building in early-stage AI venture investing, joining a chorus of investors sounding alarms over the sector’s boom.】

item.title: GIP 接近达成以约 400 亿美元收购 Aligned 数据中心的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Global Infrastructure Partners 正在就收购麦格理支持的 Aligned Data Centers 进行深入谈判，这是今年最大的交易之一。【原文：Global Infrastructure Partners is in advanced talks to acquire Macquarie-backed Aligned Data Centers in one of the biggest deals of the year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本央行上田保持开放态度，避免明确暗示利率走势
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）重申了该行在利率问题上的长期立场，避免在本月晚些时候召开的董事会上就加息前景发出任何明确的信号，从而保持了政策选择的开放性。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda kept his policy options open by reiterating the bank’s long-held stance on interest rates, avoiding sending any clear signals about the prospects for a rate hike when the board meets later this month.】

item.title: 司法部投诉后，苹果撤下 ICE 跟踪应用程序
item.description: 苹果公司的应用程序商店下架了 ICEBlock 和其他用于报告和跟踪美国移民与海关执法局特工行踪的应用程序，因为政府对此表示担忧。【原文：Apple Inc.’s App Store removed ICEBlock and other applications used to report and track sightings of US Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents after the government raised concerns.】

item.title: 印度 TCS 和科技公司将因特朗普的 H-1B 签证冲击而面临质疑
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务有限公司（Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.）将成为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）采取行动限制一项重要工作签证后第一家面对投资者的印度 IT 企业，这使得该公司股价暴跌，盈利前景黯淡。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. will be the first Indian IT firm to face investors after Donald Trump moved to curb a key work visa, sending the company’s shares tumbling and dimming its earnings outlook.】

item.title: 朝日网络攻击后，7-Eleven 超干啤酒供应告罄
item.description: 日本朝日集团控股有限公司（Asahi Group Holdings Ltd.，以下简称 "朝日控股"）的生产和销售因网络攻击陷入瘫痪，Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. and other retailers in Japan are warning customers of possible Asahi Super Dry beer shortages after a cyberattack paralyzed production and distribution at at Asahi Group Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 全球投资公司 Arena Investors 关闭新加坡办事处
item.description: 据知情人士透露，全球多策略投资公司 Arena Investors LP 正在关闭其新加坡办事处，并寻求将资源重新分配到其他地方。【原文：Global multi-strategy investment firm Arena Investors LP is shutting its Singapore office and seeking to reallocate resources elsewhere, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI 称马斯克的 xAI 提起保密诉讼是为了 "欺负 "前员工
item.description: OpenAI 公司称，指控其窃取 xAI 技术的诉讼只是埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）转移人们对其自己的生成式人工智能公司失败的注意力的最新尝试。【原文：OpenAI Inc. says a lawsuit accusing it of stealing technology from xAI is just Elon Musk’s latest attempt to distract attention from the failures of his own generative artificial intelligence company.】

item.title: 日本央行行长上田的讲话和新闻发布会以及金融市场的发展。
item.description: 2025年9月19日星期五，日本东京，日本央行行长上田一夫在央行总部举行的新闻发布会上。日本央行向政策正常化又迈出了一步，宣布将开始卸载其持有的大量交易所交易基金，同时在一次有争议的投票中保持利率稳定，因为两名反对者推动加息。【原文：Kazuo Ueda, governor of the Bank of Japan (BOJ), during a news conference at the central bank's headquarters in Tokyo, Japan, on Friday, Sept. 19, 2025. The BOJ took another step toward policy normalization, announcing it would start to offload its massive exchange-traded fund holdings even while keeping interest rates steady in a contested vote as two dissenters pushed for a hike.】
